name: Nino Foods
headline: Building India's fast food empire
description: Nino Foods builds and operates fast food restaurants in India. We own 3 brands- Nino Burgers, Francesco's Pizzeria and KHA-Fried Chicken. We operate QSR and cloud kitchen formats and have industry leading payback period per store (<1 year). We are tripling in size yearly and are profitable. We have 25 Locations in Mumbai and service 40K orders per month. The founding team has Nishant - an Insead MBA, and Pranav-who led online revenue for Disney and Conde Nast India.

founders.name: Nishant Jhaveri, Founder
founders.description: Nishant is an Insead MBA and Babson college alum with retail operations experience in India. Previously he worked on Growth at the CEO's Office at India's largest Auto Dealership Group. There he worked closely with the investors from TPG on company strategy, and with large brands like Mercedes Benz on new location launches.

founders.name: Pranav Mehra, Founder
founders.description:
Pranav Mehra is the Co Founder of Nino Foods. You can catch Pranav deeply studying his customers wants, needs and behaviours to better their food experiences. Pranav is the go to for all things marketing, branding and business development. 
Previously, Pranav founded a talent placement platform for the Film and Entertainment Industry and also led online revenue for Disney UTV and Condenast in India. 
Pranav is an Indiana Alumni with a BA in Telecommunications and Psychology
